verses.text: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* cried \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* cried aloud \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w to|strong="H5921"\w* hear \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w In|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* day \w of|strong="H6963"\w* trouble \w I|strong="H6963"\w* sought \w the|strong="H6963"\w* Lord; \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* night \w my|strong="H6963"\w* outstretched hands did not grow weary; \w my|strong="H6963"\w* soul refused \w to|strong="H6963"\w* \w be|strong="H6963"\w* comforted.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* remembered \w You|strong="H3117"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* groaned; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* mused \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w spirit|strong="H5315"\w* grew faint. Selah

\w You|strong="H7307"\w* have kept \w my|strong="H2142"\w* eyes \w from|strong="H7307"\w* closing; \w I|strong="H7878"\w* am too \w troubled|strong="H1993"\w* \w to|strong="H7307"\w* \w speak|strong="H7878"\w*.
\w I|strong="H3808"\w* considered \w the|strong="H1696"\w* days \w of|strong="H5869"\w* old, \w the|strong="H1696"\w* years long \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* past.

\w At|strong="H3117"\w* night \w I|strong="H3117"\w* remembered \w my|strong="H2803"\w* song; \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* heart \w I|strong="H3117"\w* mused, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H2803"\w* spirit \w pondered|strong="H2803"\w*:
“\w Will|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* Lord spurn \w us|strong="H2142"\w* forever \w and|strong="H3915"\w* never \w show|strong="H5973"\w* \w His|strong="H2142"\w* favor again?

\w Is|strong="H3808"\w* \w His|strong="H3808"\w* loving devotion \w gone|strong="H3808"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*? Has \w His|strong="H3808"\w* promise \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H2186"\w* \w all|strong="H5769"\w* \w time|strong="H5769"\w*?
\w Has|strong="H5331"\w* God forgotten \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w be|strong="H5331"\w* gracious? \w Has|strong="H5331"\w* His anger shut off His compassion?” Selah

So I said, “I am grieved that \w the|strong="H7911"\w* right hand of \w the|strong="H7911"\w* Most High has changed.”\f + \fr 77:10 \ft Or “To this I will appeal: to the years of the right hand of the Most High.”\f*

\w I|strong="H8141"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* remember \w the|strong="H8141"\w* works \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; yes, \w I|strong="H8141"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* remember \w Your|strong="H2470"\w* wonders \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* reflect \w on|strong="H6924"\w* all \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* done \w and|strong="H2142"\w* ponder \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* mighty \w deeds|strong="H4611"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w is|strong="H3605"\w* holy. \w What|strong="H6467"\w* god \w is|strong="H3605"\w* so great \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God?

\w You|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w God|strong="H4310"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* works wonders; \w You|strong="H1870"\w* display \w Your|strong="H1870"\w* strength \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* peoples.

\w With|strong="H6213"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w You|strong="H6213"\w* redeemed \w Your|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sons \w of|strong="H5971"\w* Jacob \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H5971"\w*. Selah

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* waters \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w You|strong="H5971"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w the|strong="H1121"\w* waters \w saw|strong="H3290"\w* \w You|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* swirled; even \w the|strong="H1121"\w* depths \w were|strong="H5971"\w* shaken.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* clouds poured \w down|strong="H2342"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* skies resounded \w with|strong="H4325"\w* thunder; \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* arrows flashed back \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w forth|strong="H2342"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* resounded \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* whirlwind; \w the|strong="H5414"\w* lightning lit \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* world; \w the|strong="H5414"\w* earth trembled \w and|strong="H1980"\w* quaked.

Your path led \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* sea, Your way \w through|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* mighty waters, but Your footprints \w were|strong="H8398"\w* not \w to|strong="H6963"\w* \w be|strong="H6963"\w* found.\f + \fr 77:19 \ft Or were unknown\f*

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* led \w Your|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flock \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* Aaron.
